name: HueCast
description:
In a mundane black and white world, it just takes a single sight of color to brighten your day. When a magical beam of light passes through the everyday furniture, they magically turn colorful. With just one light beam and whole apartment to color, mirrors and splitters come to the rescue.

Spawn and align mirrors and splitters to cast the light and color the objective furniture. With a limited count on the mirrors and splitters manage your way to color all furniture in you objective list! Can you get all the furniture colored before you run out of the inventory?

How to play

  • W-A-S-D to move the Player
  • Move Mouse to pan the Camera
  • Right Click to spawn new Mirrors
  • Left Click to spawn new Splitters

Tips

  • Each new Objective also increases Mirror and Splitters you have in inventory, always consider the inventory count before solving the objective.
  • Use your PawPrints to locate the furniture when it is out of frame 

Multiplayer

With the multiplayer mode, create a room and share the room key with your friend. Race against limited time and limited inventory to see who can color the most furniture.

Initially prototyped in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022
